description: This file defines a health check endpoint for a Flask web application using Flask-Smorest's Blueprint and MethodView. It sets up a route '/' that responds with a health status message and handles CORS preflight OPTIONS requests.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask MethodView class that provides GET and OPTIONS handlers for the health check endpoint.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Returns a JSON message indicating service health with HTTP status 200.

methods.name: options(self)
methods.description: Handles CORS preflight OPTIONS requests, returning a 204 No Content response.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
